DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy AGN-229666 treatment allergic conjunctivitis .
DOC.criteria: Japanese patient live Japan history allergic conjunctivitis Willing discontinue wear contact lens study period Use nicotine product study period Presence active eye infection ( bacterial , viral , fungal ) History ocular herpetic infection Eye surgery intervention within 3 month and/or history refractive surgery within past 6 month
